transaction in ExternalCurrencyPrice.addRefundTransaction (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#764-766) is a local variable never initialiazed

PreSaleUNIT.paymentWithCurrency (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#912-966) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-processor.addRefundTransaction(processorTransactionId,refund_amount) (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#962-965)

PreSaleUNIT.balanceOf has external calls inside a loop:
	- balance += uint96(tokens[i].balanceOf(_owner)) (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#991-992)

Reentrancy in PreSaleUNIT.fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#1006-1010):
	External calls:
	- storageWallet = baseToken.STORAGE_WALLET() (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol)
	- price = uint48(baseToken.price()) (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol)
	- accuracy = uint64(baseToken.accuracy()) (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - eth_amount) (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol)

Reentrancy in PreSaleUNIT.paymentWithCurrency (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#912-966):
	External calls:
	- paid_tokens = processor.calculateAmount(currency,value) (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#925-928)
	- refund_amount = (value - processor.calculatePrice(currency,paid_tokens)) (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#940-943)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/21/0xdbf98df5dad9077f457e1dcf85aa9420bca8b761.sol#947-948)
